description: This file defines custom styles for a Q&A viewer component, including theme variables and layout for cards and buttons.

classes.name: qa-list-scroll
classes.description: Style for scrollable Q&A list area.

classes.name: qa-question-btn
classes.description: Style for the question button in Q&A entries.

classes.name: qa-answer
classes.description: Style for the answers displayed in Q&A entries.
